1532870.name: Your city in 3D
1532870.description:
Your city in 3D it is a project that lets recreate copy of any city on the planet. A city will be as detailed as detailed map. You even will be able to find your home.

Change of night and day

Stars, Sun and Moon have real positions those depends on time. So you can setup time and see where they are on the sky above chosen city.

Different ways of exploring

You can travel by car, by walking or use free camera.

Nature and natural objects

All vegetation such as forests, swamps, fields, etc are available. Rivers, lakes and other bodies of water are available too.

OSM

Project based on OSM (Open Street Maps). It is a collaborative project to create a free editable map of the world. The geodata underlying the map is considered the primary output of the project. The creation and growth of OSM has been motivated by restrictions on use or availability of map data across much of the world, and the advent of inexpensive portable satellite navigation devices.
